Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer. We look forward to serving you and ensuring that this product becomes a cherished part of your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000.

(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
